item.description:
we can ride from the same place in Warren off Childs St. we have begun before many times... towards Bristol, in the Colt State Park either before we ride into Bristol or after, and back to the beginning.  we will be able to stop when we get to Bristol in the diner, and have brunch... then back to Warren.

 

IT'S  NOT NICE TO SIGN UP THEN NOT SHOW.  CANCEL IF YOU MUST, BUT AT CANCEL.  MORE IMPORTANTLY SHOW UP BEFORE LEAVING TIME... 15 MIN TO 30 MIN EARLY.  WE LEAVE AT THE TIME GIVEN.  you can catch up with us, but we're gone.  used to wait 15 then 20 for any late comers... show up timely.  some of us are there always 30-45 min early...show RESPECT FOR YOUR PEERS.  be on time.

 

sunday we may have a brunch at the diner right across from the end point in Bristol.  did so last yr, it was good fun... then my friend took us off route into Colt State Park and back out to the bike path.. an added fun.    its supposed to be nice.  if hot, bring water.  another reason to leave on time.  by noon, sun is high in the sky...
item.name: Warren/Bristol Biking Meetup
